org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.common
Class XMLStringContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.common.XMLContext
      org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.common.XMLStringContext

public class XMLStringContext
extends XMLContext

An instance of this class represents a parsing context within a node, where the data value is to be recorded as an in-memory string. The data string is available as a local stringbuffer object, which will be accessible to any class that extends this one.
